openai-translator/openai-translator

Browser extension and desktop app for translation using ChatGPT API

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Open-source AI chat interface for Ollama and OpenAI APIs
  • Live speech translation using OpenAI Realtime API
  • Call OpenAI models from your computer using your ChatGPT Plus account, model runs on OpenAI servers
  • Official Go library for using the OpenAI API in your Go projects
  • Community .NET library for OpenAI API
  • Chrome extension using built-in browser AI for translation
  • OpenAI-compatible server for speech-to-text, translation, and text-to-speech
  • Run open-source or custom language models as OpenAI-style APIs with one command
  • Converts Gemini CLI to OpenAI API
  • browser extension for translating pages, subtitles, messages, with offline mode, custom translators, personal dictionary, open-source and privacy-focused
